name: ToastRoot
description:
Groups all parts of an individual toast.
Renders a `<div>` element.

swipeDirection.description: Direction(s) in which the toast can be swiped to dismiss.

toast.type: { actionProps?: object, animation?: 'ending' | 'starting', data?: any, description?: string, height?: number, id: string, onRemove?: func, onRemoveComplete?: func, priority?: 'high' | 'low', timeout?: number, title: string, type?: string }

className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.
